lines.text: I originally met Mr. Vannatter when I went to the Pleasanton Gardens Senior Center. He asked

lines.text: As a member of the 507th Parachute Infantry Regiment, Mr. Vannatter participated in the Allied

spans.text: As a member of the 507th Parachute Infantry Regiment, Mr. Vannatter participated in the Allied

lines.text: operations at Normandy. He said that during the battle he lost a pair of pants. I didn’t ask him
